summaries.short: Season Two Finale. Marcello's opening night reignites Sofia's feelings for him and she is soon faced with an impossible decision.
summaries.full: Season Two Finale. Marcello's opening night has an unexpected finale and Sofia's parents learn the truth about her secret life. Sofia and Marcello get back together, but he has trouble adapting to unemployment. Sofia receives a tempting offer that could mean the end of SofiX.

summaries.short: Sofia feels ready for her new life but an important production brings back some old insecurities.​
summaries.full: SofiX receives an important and confidential request from a government official. Sofia and Marcello start planning their big day with their families, but some old insecurities arise. Sofia suspects her son is gay and receives a tempting new offer to sell her porn company.

summaries.short: Sofia and Marcello break up and Violeta has an accident.
summaries.full: The clients' fantasies are becoming more demanding and eventually endanger the cast and crew at SofiX. Sofia breaks up with Marcello and Violeta has an accident after a fight with her mother.

summaries.short: A quick look at S3 E2 of the series Hard.
summaries.full: A quick look at S3 E2 of the series Hard.

summaries.short: Sofia brings in a new investor and receives important news about her health.
summaries.full: Suspecting her family might be growing, Sofia brings in a new investor to cover her debts. The enigmatic buyer announces his plans to restructure SofiX and the stress takes a toll on Sofia's health. Marcello discovers Sofia has been hiding two important secrets from him.

summaries.short: Things seem to improve for Sofia once Marcello meets her family, but a secret threatens their relationship.
summaries.full: Sofia sorts out the company's finances and introduces Marcello to her family. During a rehearsal, Marcello's partner quits, and Sofia discovers a version of the play she was not prepared to see.

summaries.short: A quick look at S3 E3 of the series Hard.
summaries.full: A quick look at S3 E3 of the series Hard.

summaries.short: Sofia backpedals on the company’s sale and her wedding plans, but it might be too late.
summaries.full: ​Marcello begs Sofia not to sell SofiX while Sofia asks Lucia to help her reverse the deal and save her employees’ jobs. Victoria makes an unexpected announcement and Sofia’s mother takes over her wedding plans. Sofia asks Andrea for advice on her son’s sexuality.

summaries.short: Sofia's business idea pays off, but she receives bad news about both SofiX and her son.
summaries.full: Sofia's plan to provide custom experiences at SofiX starts to pay off but she is blindsided by worrisome financial news. Marcello gets a surprise at rehearsal and Julio is arrested while attending a protest.

summaries.short: A quick look at S3 E4 of the series Hard.
summaries.full: A quick look at S3 E4 of the series Hard.
